item.title: Centos ntfs-3g 挂载ntfs移动盘
item.description: 首先到官网下载源码包 http://www.tuxera.com/community/ntfs-3g-download/ tar -zxvf ntfs-3g_ntfsprogs-2012.1.15.tgz cd ntfs-3g_ntfsprogs-2012.1.15 ./configure 提示如下： [wei@liuwei ntfs-3g_ntfsprogs-2012.1.15]$ ./configure checking build system type... i686-pc-linux-gnu checking host system type... i686-pc-linux-gnu checking target system type... i686-pc-linux-gnu checking for a BSD-compatible install... /usr/bin/install -c checking whether build environment is sane... yes checking for a thread-safe mkdir -p... /bin/mkdir -p checking for gawk... gawk checking whether make sets

item.title: Centos6.3 安装VirtualBox
item.description: 查看系统信息： [wei@liuwei ~]$ uname -a Linux liuwei.co 2.6.32-279.14.1.el6.i686 #1 SMP Tue Nov 6 21:05:14 UTC 2012 i686 i686 i386 GNU/Linux 从官网（https://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Linux_Do
